languages.text: {n}Недоверчиво прищурившись, культист кладет руку на оружие.{/n} "Подозрительн{mf|ый|ая} ты".
{n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "There's something off about you."
languages.original_text: {n}Недоверчиво прищурившись, культист кладет руку на оружие.{/n} "Подозрительн{mf|ый|ая} ты".

traits.locale_text: {n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "You look dodgy."
{n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "You look dodgy."
{n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "You look dodgy."
{n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "You look dodgy."
{n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "There's something off about you."
{n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "There's something off about you."

languages.text: {n}Der Kultist kneift misstrauisch die Augen zusammen und legt eine Hand an seine Waffe.{/n} "Irgendetwas stimmt nicht mit Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "There's something off about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kultist kneift misstrauisch die Augen zusammen und legt eine Hand an seine Waffe.{/n} "Ihr seht verdächtig aus."

languages.text: {n}Le cultiste plisse les yeux avec méfiance et pose la main sur son arme.{/n} « Il y a quelque chose qui ne tourne pas rond, chez vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "There's something off about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cultiste plisse les yeux avec méfiance et pose la main sur son arme.{/n} « Je vous trouve très louche. »

languages.text: {n}邪教徒微微眯起眼睛，把手放在武器上。{/n}“你有点不太对劲儿。”
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "There's something off about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}邪教徒微微眯起眼睛，把手放在武器上。{/n}“你看起来很可疑。”

languages.text: {n}信者は警戒して目を細め、武器に手を置く。{/n}「どうも怪しい奴だな」
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "There's something off about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}信者は警戒して目を細め、武器に手を置く。{/n}「どうも怪しい奴だな」

languages.text: {n}El cultista entrecierra los ojos con cautela y pone una mano en su arma.{/n} «Algo no encaja en ti».
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "There's something off about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El cultista entrecierra los ojos con cautela y pone una mano en su arma.{/n} «Tienes un aspecto sospechoso».

languages.text: {n}Tarikatçı, ihtiyatla gözlerini kısıyor ve elini silahına götürüyor.{/n} "Sende bir tuhaflık var."
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist squints warily and lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "There's something off about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tarikatçı, ihtiyatla gözlerini kısıyor ve elini silahına götürüyor.{/n} "Sende bir tuhaflık var."
